QuestData.Title: Halls of Stone
QuestData.Description: Well now, I'm surprised to see other adventurers in a place such as this.$b$bIf my research on these halls is accurate, there be monumental discoveries to be made here!$b$bAssumin' I can count on ya to watch my back, you're welcome to tag along.
QuestData.LogDescription: Brann Bronzebeard wants you to accompany him as he uncovers the secrets that lie in the Halls of Stone.
QuestData.CompletionText: Well, now, it turned out ta be a good thing we ran into each other after all.
QuestData.RewardText: Always more questions than answers, eh, $g lad:lass;?
